story.title: The Nest Behind the Name
story.subtitle: Three generations, one family home.
story.description: Glory Nest isn't just a villa—it's woven from the dreams of a grandmother, built by a father, and nurtured by a son. Every corner whispers stories of roots, resilience, and the simple joy of welcoming others home.

roots.title: Where It All Began
roots.content: It started with Grandmother—a woman who dreamed big despite having little. Her vision for a family gathering place became the seed for what Glory Nest is today.

generations.title: Built with Love, Brick by Brick
generations.content: Father took that dream and made it real. Through years of careful planning and hard work, he transformed the vision into walls, rooms, and a courtyard that became the heart of family life.

today.title: A Nest for You
today.content: Now, the son opens these doors to travelers like you. Glory Nest is more than accommodation—it's an invitation to be part of our extended family, even if just for a few nights.

giving.title: Giving Back
giving.content: Because we've been blessed, we believe in passing it forward. Every stay contributes to our E-Fund, supporting local families with education and emergency needs.

faq.title: Questions? We've Got Answers.
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before booking

location.a: We're tucked in a quiet residential area, about 5 minutes by bike to Hoi An Ancient Town and 10 minutes to An Bang Beach. Close enough to explore, far enough to rest.

family.q: Is Glory Nest good for families with young kids?
family.a: Absolutely! The villa is spacious, the pool is perfect for splashing, and we can help arrange cribs, high chairs, or babysitting if needed.

honeymoon.q: Can you arrange something special for honeymooners?
honeymoon.a: Yes! Let us know in advance and we'll set up a romantic welcome—think fresh flowers, local wine, and a private dinner setup.

food.a: We don't offer full meal service, but we can arrange a private chef, recommend nearby restaurants, or point you to the best street food spots.

booking.a: We offer flexible cancellation up to 7 days before check-in for a full refund. Within 7 days, 50% refund. Life happens—we get it.

faq.cta: Still have questions? Message us directly—we're here to help.
